meaningMnemonic: You have <kanji>consolation</kanji> so now you can <kanji>relax</kanji>. What a great feeling this is. You now have <vocabulary>solace</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>relaxation</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
